item.title: Athome Solution
item.description: Internship Experience as Software Developper During my 3-month internship at Athome Solution, a web application company based in Bordeaux , France. I had the opportunity to work on an exciting project involving web APIs. One of my key contributions was developing a program that retrieves their web APIs from the project and parses them to generate automated test suites. In addition, I implemented continuous integration to ensure that each push or merge of code to the main branch of the project triggers API testing and generates test results.
